intro.p: This node converts columns from the new date&time data types to the old type.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the included columns will be converted.

tab.name: Time Zone Handling

option.name: Add the offset of the time zone to the time

tab.option: If checked, the offset of the time zone will be added to the time. Otherwise the time zone will be just dropped.

ports.outPort: Output table containing the converted columns.
